works.description:
Any and all rights to images of me, Marc 

Oliver, represented by Wilhelmina Models are reserved and protected by my 

Agency.

I just stumbled across this unauthorized publication by doing a google  
search on my name. I'm not sure how to find out who the blogger is or how 

he gained access to my images!?

But to make things worst, this blog apparently targets a "special
interest"  
group and is therefore affiliated with very explicit (homo-)sexual
content.

I request the immediate removal of all of my images from the above  
mentioned website and will discuss possible legal consequences against the
 
individual blogger with my agency.

Thanks for your support.

Marc Oliver
